alert.note: Alert for Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 25 at 9:27AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding from irrigation ditches and canals near Hardin. * WHERE...A portion of south central Montana, including the following county, Big Horn. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of areas immediate to irrigation ditches and canals, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 924 AM MDT, High flows from the Bighorn River are causing irrigation ditches and canals to overtop and erode, flooding nearby areas near Hardin. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hardin and Crow Indian Reservation. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places. Please report observed flooding to local emergency officials and request they pass the information to the National Weather Service in Billings.
